title: Initial App Setup & Configuration
content: Completed basic authentication flows (login/logout). Configured CORS policy for local development environment. Ready to integrate Firestore for live testing.

title: Real-Time Sync Feature - Alpha Test Report
content: Tested real-time cursor positioning with 5 users. Bug found: latency spikes when large paragraphs are pasted. Requires optimization of WebSockets payload size.

title: Marketing Strategy Brainstorm: Q4
content: Focus on developer community outreach. Target subreddits and tech forums. Prepare a simple demo video showcasing the document history feature.

title: Database Schema Review: User Permissions
content: Verified many-to-many relationship for document sharing. Added 'owner_id' to the 'notes' table. Ready for pull request and peer review.

title: Future Feature Idea: Markdown Support
content: Investigate implementing a rich text editor that natively supports Markdown formatting and rendering for developers.

title: Design System: Typography & Color Palette
content: Finalized primary font stack (Inter, sans-serif) and defined the 5-color palette for note categorization (Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Gray).

title: To-Do: Clean up unused CSS files
content: Remove deprecated styling from the document viewer component. Consolidate utility classes using Tailwind CSS for better performance.

title: User Feedback Summary - Week 1
content: Top request: Drag-and-drop ordering in the document list. Second request: Dark mode toggle. Prioritize drag-and-drop for Sprint 2.

title: Dependency Audit & Security Check
content: Updated all major npm packages (React, Firebase). Ran vulnerability scanner (Snyk) with no critical vulnerabilities found.

title: Deployment Pipeline Update
content: Successfully migrated CI/CD to use GitHub Actions for automated testing and staging deployment on every push to the 'main' branch.
